## PackageManager.setPackageVisible() method

给定XR软件包的唯一标识符,设置其是否在launcher中显示

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static setPackageVisible( packageName : string, visible : boolean) : void ;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageName | string | 软件包唯一标识符,对应XRPackage\_getName()获取到的字符串 |
|  visible | boolean | 是否在launcher中显示 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
